An abstract class to map entity fields to table columns.

package Aura.Sql

 Methods

Compares a new value and an old value to see if they are the same.

compare(mixed $new, mixed $old) : bool

If they are both numeric, use loose (==) equality; otherwise, use strict (===) equality.

Parameters

$new

mixed

The new value.

$old

mixed

The old value.

Returns

boolTrue if they are equal, false if not.

Returns the table column name for a given entity field name.

getColForField(string $field) : string

Parameters

$field

string

The entity field name.

Returns

stringThe mapped table column name.

Returns the list of table columns.

getCols() : array

Returns

array

Returns the entity field name for a given table column name.

getFieldForCol(string $col) : string

Parameters

$col

string

The table column name.

Returns

stringThe mapped entity field name.

Returns the list of entity fields.

getFields() : array

Returns

array

Returns the identity field name for mapped entities.

getIdentityField() : string

Returns

stringThe identity field name.

Given an entity object, returns the identity field value.

getIdentityValue(object $entity) : mixed

Parameters

$entity

object

The entity object.

Returns

mixedThe value of the identity field on the object.

Given an entity object, creates an array of mapped table column names to entity field values for inserts.

object

The entity object.

array

Returns the primary column name on the table.

stringThe primary column name.

Returns the mapped SQL table name.

stringThe mapped SQL table name.

Returns a column name, dot-prefixed with the table name.

getTableCol(string $col) : string

Parameters

$col

string

The column name.

Returns

stringThe fully-qualified table-and-column name.

Returns a column name, dot-prefixed with the table name, "AS" its mapped entity name.

getTableColAsField(string $col) : string

Parameters

$col

string

The column name.

Returns

stringThe fully-qualified table-and-column name "AS" the mapped entity name.

Returns an array of fully-qualified table columns names "AS" their mapped entity field names.

getTableColsAsFields(array $cols) : array

Parameters

$cols

array

The column names.

Returns

array

Returns the primary column name, dot-prefixed with the table name.

getTablePrimaryCol() : string

Returns

stringThe fully-qualified table-and-primary name.

Given an entity object, creates an array of mapped table column names to entity field values for updates; when an array of initial data is present, the returned array will have only changed values.

getUpdateData(object $entity, array $initial_data) : array

Parameters

$entity

object

The entity object.

$initial_data

array

The initial data for the entity.

Returns

array

Given an entity object and an array of initial data, returns an array mapped table columns and changed values.

getUpdateDataChanges(object $entity, array $initial_data) : array

Parameters

$entity

object

The entity object.

$initial_data

array

The array of initial data.

Returns

array

Given a Delete query object and an entity object, modify the Delete to use the mapped table, and to set a where condition to match the primary column to the identity value.

modifyDelete(Aura\Sql\Query\Delete $delete, object $entity) : void

Parameters

$delete

\Aura\Sql\Query\Delete

The Delete query object.

$entity

object

The entity object.

Given an Insert query object and an entity object, modifies the Insert to use the mapped table, with the column names mapped from the entity field names, and binds the entity field values to the query.

modifyInsert(Aura\Sql\Query\Insert $insert, object $entity) : void

Parameters

$insert

\Aura\Sql\Query\Insert

The Insert query object.

$entity

object

The entity object.

Given a Select object and an array of column names, modifies the Select SELECT those columns AS their mapped entity field names FROM the mapped table.

modifySelect(Aura\Sql\Query\Select $select, array $cols) : void

Parameters

$select

\Aura\Sql\Query\Select

The Select object to modify.

$cols

array

The columns to select; if empty, selects all mapped columns.

Given an Update query object and an entity object, modifies the Update to use the mapped table, with the column names mapped from the entity field names, binding the entity field values to the query, and setting a where condition to match the primary column to the identity value.

modifyUpdate(Aura\Sql\Query\Update $update, object $entity, array $initial_data) : void

When an array of initial data is present, the update will use only changed values (instead of sending all the entity values).

Parameters

$update

\Aura\Sql\Query\Update

The Update query object.

$entity

object

The entity object.

$initial_data

array

The initial data for the entity object; used to determine what values have changed on the entity.

 Properties

 

A map of table columns to entity fields.

$cols_fields : array

 

The identity field in the entity (maps to the primary column).

$identity_field : string

 

The primary column in the table (maps to the identity field.)

$primary_col : string

 

The SQL table this mapper works with.

$table : string
